features: Dual Cleaning Mop Pads- These swiffer wet pads are perfect cleaning solution as heavy duty wet mopping cloths and dry sweeping cloth thanks to their dual wicking fibers and looped fibers. With 2 fibers’ unique grip technology, these swiffer sweeper pads effectively lock and capture pet hair, dirt, debris, grime and kitchen grease instead of moving them around. Nothing escapes professional mop refill's ultra-fine grip.

Reusable Swiffer Pads- These swiffer dry sweeping cloths can be washed up to 100 times to replace hundreds of disposable pads, and you can also use your own cleaners instead of those chemical-laden cleaning towels. A greener solution that saves the planet, reduces landfill waste and saves you money. Besides, super absorbent microfiber fabric with wide coverage for mopping will achieve thorough cleaning meanwhile leave no streak or puddle, making your hardwood floor look new again.

Compatibility- Measures 11.4"x 5.5". These swiffer refills fit Swiffer Sweeper dust mop and wet mopping starter kit as wet pads and dry pads. NOT for Sweeper XL or Sweeper Vacuum (Note:Mop is NOT Included)

Upgraded Swiffer Experience- The strong and durable velcro strap stays firmly on the mop head while mopping, and is tested to withstand multiple washes. No more worries about the disposable pads falling off. Great for home, kitchen, office, dorm, apartment and school.

Easy to Use- With hook and loop fasteners, our reusable swiffer mop pads can be easily attached to the mop for cleaning or removed for replacement. Comes with 3 pads so you can switch them to wash and use them on different types of floors such as hardwood, tile, laminate, linoleum, vinyl, marble, stone, bamboo.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unique Two Fabrics Combine Scrubbing & Absorbency Better Scrubbing Power - Compared with disposable pads, these swiffer sweeper heavy duty mop pads are more solid and stickier, you won't worry about the paper ones slipping or tearing during mopping, protecting your hardwoods from scratches. For Wet Dry Cleaning - Consist of looped fiber and wicking fibers, these swiffer dry sweeping cloths efficiently trap dust, dirt, grime and absorb spillages, making both wet and dry mopping a breeze, leaving your floors spotless and sparkling. You can use these swiffer wet pads refill for sweeper mop to clean any mess around the house then throw them in the washing machine to be repeatedly used over.

Washable & Reusable Swiffer Mop Pads More Sustainable and Cost-effective - The reusable mop pads compatible with Swiffer Sweeper Mop offer a convenient and greener alternative to disposable pads. These swiffer wet pads are durable, machine-washable, and can be reused multiple times without losing shape, saving you money in the long run. If you're looking for a greener and more economical option, these mop pads are an excellent choice. Valuable 3 Set of Green Swiffer Sweeper Mop Pads - These microfiber mop pads are designed to fit Swiffer Sweeper and other 10" 11" 12" mop perfectly with velcro, stick well and clean up well. Package includes three pads, providing replacements for extended use and different areas’ cleaning.
Easy to Assemble & Remove with Velcro

Microfiber Swiffer Wet Pads Suitable for All Hard Surfaces Microfiber fabric has strong water absorption capacity thus it can absorb excess water instantly to protect your wooden floor from being over-soaked. Suitbale for different types of floors such as hardwood, tile, laminate, linoleum, vinyl, marble, stone, bamboo. Great for home, kitchen, office, dorm, apartment and school.

Swiffer Sweeper Pads Refills Make Tackling Messes A Breeze These mop pads measure 11.4" x 5.5", designed for Swiffer Sweeper. NOT for Sweeper XL or Sweeper Vacuum (Note:Mop is NOT Included) With hook and loop fasteners, our swiffer sweeper pads can be easily attached to the mop for cleaning or removed for replacement. Meanwhile, they can be conveniently hung to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Immensely better than the disposable wet pads
reviews.reviewText: They clean very well (I use the appropriate Bona floor sprays on both the sealed hardwood and our laminates) and, most importantly, THEY STAY ON THE SWIFFER HEAD. Also they don't streak on the laminate floors. Make sure you follow the initial instructions to wet the nap before first use. Haven't run thru the wash yet but they do grab a lot of dirt off the floor in one pass. A good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saving money by not buy disposables
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea of just throwing away the disposables that come with the kit but in the long run I FEEL this saves $ and they work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that you can just throw them in the wash and keep re-using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for small spills
reviews.reviewText: I've been enjoying using these washable swiffer pads and I know they're going to save me money.I clean a lot of spills and messes from my dogs, and these pads make the process much easier to deal with. The only thing I wish is that they were more absorbent. Maybe the pile could be a bit thicker?These are great for people who have to clean lots of light spills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and works well
reviews.reviewText: Soaked it like instructions before using it but not sure that made a big difference. Still, it worked very well and construction is good. I advise keeping the velcro attached when washing and drying. I have used it and it performed great, exactly as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WAY BETTER THAN THE PRE-SOAPED SWIFFER PADS
reviews.reviewText: I work as a Desk Attendant at a gym and we're fanatical about cleanliness. These pads are far superior to the pre-soaped Swiffer Pads. The velcro straps mean they stay on the Swiffer much better, are far more absorbent, and the terry cloth texture means they are better for scrubbing. We use them for a multitude of things, cleaning the shower walls, washing the floors, cleaning the tracks on the treadmills. They wash well, the velcro is super sticky, and they last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wash
reviews.reviewText: I like that it doesn’t come off from the swifter. It cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Great! Easy to take apart and store . Love it
Works great, fits great, use , wash , air dry, reuse. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pads are well made, they do exactly what you would expect and make a clean quick job of mopping the floor. I spray some disinfectant down first and then this mop sorts the floors out speedily. They wash well so far, and they dry relatively quickly. Save money on the soaking wet disposable wipes and get these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice mop head to save using wet wipes. Well made quality with strong Velcro grip.There Good buy happy with them.
